metadata.title: CVE-2024-57904 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  iio: adc: at91: call input_free_device() on allocated iio_dev  Current implementation of at91_ts_register() calls input_free_deivce() on st->ts_input, however, the err label can be reached before the allocated iio_dev is stored to st->ts_input. Thus call input_free_device() on input instead of st->ts_input.
